resources.string: Oro Kalimpyo
3 Easy Steps
Segregate
Prepare
Show QR Code
That would be all. Thank you for your cooperation!
The only thing that you are going to do is just follow these 3 easy steps.
Waste segregation is an ideal way to diminish the impact of landfills on the environment as well as health issues that can result from improperly disposed of wastes and toxins.
Gather your waste and place it in designated bins. This includes recyclable materials, non-recyclable materials, and yard waste.
Show your QR Code to the waste collector so that they would be able to credit your contribution.
Oro Kalimpyo App
Seamless Collection
Partnership
City Implementation
SL Devs
The Oro Kalimpyo App is a mobile platform for Android devices for optimizing the segregation of waste materials in Cagayan de Oro City, Philippines.

It uses a QR code for processing users and their waste-generation data. The generated data will be use for report generation about the city\'s waste generation quantity that provide statical evidence for a better assessment on partaking reusing recyclable solid waste.
The application is the project of the Healthy Oceans and Cleans Cities Initiative (HOCCI) by the UN-Habitat Philippines, funded by the Government of Japan.
Implemented in the City of Cagayan de Oro with the partnership with the City Local Environment and Natural Resources Office (CLENRO).

The project was based from the Hackathon called "Plastic (3R) Hacks PH)" on the year 2021. Developed by the students from STI College Cagayan de Oro under the team name SL Devs which is now called Autodidactics.
Salamat sa pag-download ani nga app ug unta gamiton ninyo kani para makatabang mo dili lang para sa syudad peru para pud sa usag ka tao.

â–¶ declares the policy of the state in adopting a systematic, comprehensive and ecological solid waste management program that ensures the protection of public health and the environment and the proper segregation, collection, transport, storage, treatment and disposal of solid waste through the formulation and adoption of best environmental practices.

Step 1. Tap "Redeemable Rewards".
Step 2. Tap the reward that you like.
Step 3. Tap Yes to redeem the reward.
Step 4. Go to Profile and tap Redeemed Codes.
Step 5. Show your code to the nearest branch and redeem your rewards.
